membership.congratulations:
Congratulations, your subscription has been successfully completed. 
We're delighted that you've chosen memoWikis. 
Now you can access all our courses and learning materials without restrictions and accelerate your learning progress.

header.topLabel: Become a member and support free education
header.title: Membership
header.bottomLabel1: Public content on memoWikis is freely accessible. Free data - free software (open data open access)!
header.bottomLabel2: Do you want to use memoWikis for private content? Here are our prices:

redirectDialog.title: Redirecting to Stripe
redirectDialog.message: You will now be redirected to our payment service provider Stripe, who will also store your email address.

stripe.error: Unfortunately, a connection to the Stripe payment service provider could not be established.

basic.name: Free
basic.description: You can do everything. Only the number of private contents is limited.

list.publicContent: Unlimited public content (view, create and learn)

plus.name: Plus
plus.description: You support further development! Unlimited private content!

team.name: Team
team.description: For teams that need central administration and private content.

list.teamPrivateContent: Edit private content as a team

organisation.name: Organisation
organisation.priceLabel: Individual prices. Please contact us for more information.

description.support: For companies and institutions that need additional support.
description.team: Keep your team up to date.

list.hosting: Dedicated server / hosting in your data centre

billing.question: What happens when my subscription expires?
billing.answer: When your subscription expires, you can no longer create additional private content beyond the basic limits. However, your existing content will not be deleted.

privateContent.question: Will private content be deleted when my subscription expires?
privateContent.answer: No, your private content will not be deleted unless you want it to be. You can still access it even after your subscription has expired.

unlimitedContent.question: What does 'unlimited content' mean, are there no limits?
unlimitedContent.answer: So far, we haven't set any limits. However, if technical boundaries are reached, we will inform you. With normal use, you shouldn't reach any technical limits. Limits for images and videos are still being determined.

payment.question: How does payment work?
payment.answer: Payment is processed through the payment service provider Stripe. Stripe operates in compliance with GDPR ({stripePrivacyUrl}). We only receive feedback from Stripe about the payment success. All other processes, such as invoicing and credit card data management, are carried out by Stripe.

cardDeclined.question: My credit card was declined and I want to access my private content. What do I do?
cardDeclined.answer: Even if your subscription has expired or your credit card was declined during renewal, you can still access your private content.

wikimedia.info: Wikipedia/Wikimedia hosts millions of images that can be freely used. On Wikimedia Commons, you can specifically search for content.
wikimedia.tip: Tip: When you click on the desired image on Wikipedia or Wikimedia Commons, you get to the detail view. (For some maps, you must click on the "i" logo in the bottom right corner.) Just copy the URL of that page.
wikimedia.urlTooltip: For images from Wikipedia/Wikimedia, you can provide the detail page URL, the media viewer's image display URL, the image file URL, or the filename (including extension).

license.title: Copyright information:
license.info: We need copyright information for this image to ensure that content on memoWikis can be freely reused. memoWikis follows the Wikipedia principle.

license.notOwnWork: This image is not my own work.

license.useWikimedia: We kindly ask you to upload the image to Wikimedia and embed it that way.

ccBy40.displayTextFull: This content is licensed under 'Creative Commons: Attribution 4.0 International'. You can freely use and modify it as long as you credit the author and link to the license (cf. the summary and the detailed license text).

bamf.displayTextFull: This content represents an 'other official work' according to § 5 Para. 2 of the Copyright Act. It may be used freely, but the source must be cited and no changes may be made.

elwis.displayTextFull: The question and answer options are from the Electronic Waterway Information Service (ELWIS.de) of the Federal Waterways and Shipping Administration.

blac.nameLong: Federal/State Working Group on Chemical Safety (BLAC)
blac.displayTextFull: The question, answer options and reference to sources are from the Common Question Catalog of the States (GFK) for the competence examination according to § 5 of the Chemical Prohibition Ordinance and are collected in this PDF. The use of the question catalog is permitted in accordance with § 62 Para. 1 to 3 (prohibition of changes) and § 63 Para. 1 and 2 (source citation) of the Copyright Act. Author is the BLAC.

userAboutMe.placeholderFlavorText1: This user hasn't shared anything about themselves yet. 🤷‍♀️
userAboutMe.placeholderFlavorText2: Looks like this person is keeping their story a mystery for now! 🕵️
userAboutMe.placeholderFlavorText3: This user is probably too busy learning awesome stuff to write about themselves! 📚
